cyclone.name: FRANKLIN
cyclone.current_location: about 290 miles south of Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to turn north on Tuesday, cross Hispaniola early Wednesday, then move north-northeast into the southwest Atlantic south of Bermuda
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern coast of Hispaniola (near the Dominican Republic–Haiti border)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical-storm watch from the north and east coasts of the Dominican Republic to Isla Saona and the Turks and Caicos Islands
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical-storm warning along the entire south coasts of the Dominican Republic and Haiti
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Hispaniola south coast, Haiti south coast, Turks & Caicos later in the week
weather_observation.wind: Only a slight (≤3%) chance of tropical-storm-force winds; breezy conditions possible mid-week
weather_observation.rainfall: Periods of rain with totals generally 1–3 inches possible Tuesday night through Thursday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Localized minor flooding in poor-drainage areas possible during heavier showers
